text: Money differs from an automobile or mistress in being equally important to those who have it and those who do not.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

text: It is a waste of money to help those who show no desire to help themselves.
author: Taylor Caldwell

text: A billion here, a billion there, and pretty soon you're talking about real money.
author: Everett Dirksen

text: All riches have their origin in mind. Wealth is in ideas - not money.
author: Robert Collier

text: I've made all my money on my own without my family and I work very hard.
author: Paris Hilton
